name: Everything Food Truck
description:
Welcome to the Everything Food Truck! 

Frantically serve meals to hungry customers to try to get a high score! Simply drag the requested items off the menu to the tray below, click "Deliver", and then click the customer requesting the food.

Serving customers consecutively without mistake will get a combo going!

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2 in January 2021 in 48 hours.
